headers.value: default-src 'self' https://trello.com https://*.trello.com https://*.trellocdn.com https://*.atlassian.com https://*.atl-paas.net; script-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline' 'unsafe-eval' https://trello.com https://*.trello.com https://*.trellocdn.com https://*.atlassian.com; style-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline' https://*.trellocdn.com; img-src 'self' data: https:; connect-src 'self' https://trello.com https://api.trello.com https://*.trellocdn.com https://*.atlassian.com; frame-ancestors https://trello.com https://*.trello.com;
